name: The Game Theorists
about:
Hello Internet! Welcome to GAME THEORY! If you’re like us, then you’ve probably wondered about the secrets hidden in your favorite games. We explore the vast lore of Minecraft, piece together the craziest FNAF conspiracies, and cover the whole world of indie gaming on this channel. Join the ORIGINAL Team Theorist and Level up by hitting subscribe!

For even more theories, check out our other channels: Food Theory, Film Theory, and Style Theory!

We have a strict policy on image use for our videos, which includes only using images licensed for reuse. If we use fanart we try to find a proper source to credit the artist, but sometimes things slip through. If you think we have used your art without your permission please let us know on the Game Theorist subreddit.
